name: rize-io-sessions
title: Rize.io Sessions
description: Raycast extension for managing Rize.io sessions (start, stop, extend).
author: sdquinn

commands.name: start-session
commands.title: Start Session
commands.description: Initiate a new Rize session - break, meeting, or focus.

commands.name: stop-session
commands.title: Stop Session
commands.description: This stops the current Rize session.

commands.name: extend-session
commands.title: Extend Session
commands.description: This extends the current Rize session.

commands.name: clear-api-key
commands.title: Clear Rize.io API Key
commands.description: Remove the stored Rize.io API key

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
